alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 12 at 5:48PM CDT until May 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR RAWLINS AND DECATUR COUNTIES... At 547 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Danbury to near McDonald, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility. SOURCE...Public via social media. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Highway 36 and secondary roadways will be impacted. Locations impacted include... Oberlin, Atwood, McDonald, Norcatur, Herndon, Jennings and Ludell. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
